				<section data-id="716dd78" class="elementor-element elementor-element-716dd78 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section" data-element_type="section">
						<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
				<div class="elementor-row">
				<div data-id="c3154fb" class="elementor-element elementor-element-c3154fb elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-inner-column" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">

				<div data-id="c94f7f2" class="elementor-element elementor-element-c94f7f2 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>Attention Addresses are linked to AMARK consumer data and have specific rules enforced by the XRC protocol. There are two key functions of attention addresses:</p></div>

				<section data-id="ee475f1" class="elementor-element elementor-element-ee475f1 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section" data-element_type="section">
						<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
				<div class="elementor-row">
				<div data-id="937bdfc" class="elementor-element elementor-element-937bdfc elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-inner-column" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
					<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
				<div data-id="d69b77b" class="elementor-element elementor-element-d69b77b elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">XRC-LOCK</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div data-id="a3a014c" class="elementor-element elementor-element-a3a014c elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>XRC-Lock is a feature that encourages continued consumer engagement with AMARK. The XRC sent to Attention Addresses is initially locked and becomes available after a maturation period. The XRC attention awards paid to consumers continually matures into availability as new XRC is earned from ongoing attention marketing. This process encourages engagement with AMARK as attention wallets will rarely have a zero XRC balance, giving consumers a consistent flow of value to spend within the ecosystem.</p></div>
				</div>
				</div>
						</div>
			</div>
		</div>
				<div data-id="9bdf532" class="elementor-element elementor-element-9bdf532 elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-inner-column" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
					<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
				<div data-id="f67fec6" class="elementor-element elementor-element-f67fec6 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-element_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">XRC-BURN</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div data-id="48587d3" class="elementor-element elementor-element-48587d3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-element_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>XRC-Burn is enforced at the protocol level. All transfers to Attention Addresses require 5% of the XRC transferred to be burned. The XRC-Burn feature is designed to align interests between merchants and consumers in the AMARK ecosystem. Anytime merchants use the AMARK platform for marketing, they are supporting the value of the XRC currency as protocol rules enforces a 5% burn. As such, merchants are effectively scaling the supply of XRC to match the demand from the ecosystem. This supply-side scaling mechanism will offset new coins introduced through block rewards and pressure the price of XRC to an equilibrium reflective of demand from the ecosystem.</p></div>
				</div>
				</div>
						</div>
			</div>
		</div>
						</div>
			</div>
		</section>
						</div>
			</div>
		</div>
						</div>
			</div>

<script>

let numberOfMerchants = [];
let numberOfConsumers = [];
let xrcDemand = [];
let xrcBurn = [];



function createChart(elementID, title) {

  var ctx = document.getElementById(elementID   ).getContext('2d');

  var gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, 0, 600);
  if(elementID=='demandChart' || elementID=='burnChart'){
     var gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, 0, 0);
    gradient.addColorStop(0, '#ffffff');
    gradient.addColorStop(1, '#ffffff');    
}else{  
     var gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, 0, 600);
    gradient.addColorStop(0, '#2b4359');
    gradient.addColorStop(1, '#4d7b93');    
  }
  
  
    //Create TOtal Merchants
  if(elementID=='merchantChart')  {
    return new Chart(ctx, {
      type: 'bar',
      data: {
          labels: ["2020", "2021", "2022", "2023", "2024"],
          datasets: [{
              label: title,
              data: [0, 0, 0, 0, 0].map(function(num) {
                return Math.round(num);
              }),
              backgroundColor: gradient,
              hoverBackgroundColor: gradient,
              hoverBorderWidth: 2,
              borderColor: [
                  'rgba(255,99,132,1)',
                  'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)',
                  'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)',
                  'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)',
                  'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)',
                  'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)'
              ]
          }]
      },
      options: {
          // responsive: false,
          scaleShowVerticalLines: false,
          legend: {
            display: false
          },
          scales: {
              yAxes: [{
                  ticks: {
                    fontColor: "rgba(30, 65, 90, 1)",
                      beginAtZero: true,
                      // Abbreviate the millions
                      callback: function(value, index, values) {
                          if (value >= 1e6) {
                            return value / 1e6 + 'M';
                          } else if (value > 1e4) {
                            return value / 1000 + 'K';
                          } else {
                            return value;
                          }
                      },
                      
                      stepSize: 30000,
                      max: 150000
                  }
              }],
               xAxes : [ {
                ticks:{
                    fontColor: "rgba(30, 65, 90, 1)"
                },
            gridLines : {
                display : false
            }
        } ]
              
          }
      }
  });
  }
  else if(elementID=='consumerChart'){
    return new Chart(ctx, {
      type: 'bar',
      data: {
          labels: ["2020", "2021", "2022", "2023", "2024"],
          datasets: [{
              label: title,
              data: [0, 0, 0, 0, 0].map(function(num) {
                return Math.round(num);
              }),
              backgroundColor: gradient,
              hoverBackgroundColor: gradient,
              hoverBorderWidth: 2,
              borderColor: [
                  'rgba(255,99,132,1)',
                  'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)',
                  'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)',
                  'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)',
                  'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)',
                  'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)'
              ]
          }]
      },
      options: {
          // responsive: false,
          scaleShowVerticalLines: false,
          legend: {
            display: false
          },
          scales: {
              yAxes: [{
                  ticks: {
                      beginAtZero: true,
                      fontColor: "rgba(30, 65, 90, 1)",
                      // Abbreviate the millions
                      callback: function(value, index, values) {
                          if (value >= 1e6) {
                            return value / 1e6 + 'M';
                          } else if (value > 1e4) {
                            return value / 1000 + 'K';
                          } else {
                            return value;
                          }
                      },
                      
                      stepSize: 20000000,
                      max: 100000000
                  }
              }],
               xAxes : [ {
                ticks:{
                    fontColor: "rgba(30, 65, 90, 1)"
                },
            gridLines : {
                display : false
            }
        } ]
              
          }
      }
  });
  }
  else{

  return new Chart(ctx, {
      type: 'line',
      data: {
          labels: ["2020", "2021", "2022", "2023", "2024"],
          datasets: [{
              label: title,
              data: [0, 0, 0, 0, 0].map(function(num) {
                return Math.round(num);
              }),
              backgroundColor: gradient,
              
              borderColor: "rgba(30, 65, 90, 1)"                                          
             
          }]
      },
      options: {
          // responsive: false,
          scaleShowVerticalLines: false,
          legend: {
            display: false
          },
          elements: {
            line: {
                tension: 0, // disables bezier curves
            }
        },
        tooltips: {
        enabled: false
    },
    hover: {
        animationDuration: 0
    },
    animation: {
        duration: 1,
        onComplete: function () {
            var chartInstance = this.chart,
                ctx = chartInstance.ctx;
            ctx.font = Chart.helpers.fontString(10, Chart.defaults.global.defaultFontStyle, Chart.defaults.global.defaultFontFamily);
            ctx.textAlign = 'center';
            ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(30, 65, 90, 1)";                        
            ctx.textBaseline = 'bottom';

            this.data.datasets.forEach(function (dataset, i) {
                var meta = chartInstance.controller.getDatasetMeta(i);
                meta.data.forEach(function (bar, index) {
                    var data = dataset.data[index];
                        if (data >= 1e9) {
                            data= Math.trunc(data / 1e9) + 'G';
                            }
                          else if (data >= 1e6) {
                            data= Math.trunc(data / 1e6) + 'M';
                          } else if (data > 1e4) {
                            data= Math.trunc(data / 1000) + 'K';
                          } else {
                            
                          }   
                          if(index==0){                        
                            ctx.fillText(data, bar._model.x +13, bar._model.y -5);
                        }
                        else if(index==1 || index==2 || index==3){
                            ctx.fillText(data, bar._model.x - 13, bar._model.y -5);
                        }
                        else{
                            ctx.fillText(data, bar._model.x +3, bar._model.y + 18);
                    }   
                });
            });
        }
    },
        
          scales: {
              yAxes: [{
                  ticks: {
                    display: false,
                      beginAtZero: true
                      
                      /*callback: function(value, index, values) {
                          if (value >= 1e6) {
                            return value / 1e6 + 'M';
                          } else if (value > 1e4) {
                            return value / 1000 + 'K';
                          } else {
                            return value;
                          }
                      }*/
                  }
              }],
               xAxes : [ {
                ticks:{
                  fontColor: "rgba(30, 65, 90, 1)"  
                },
            gridLines : {
                display : false
            }
        } ]
              
          }
      }
  });
  }
  
}

jQuery(document).ready(function () {
            let salesPersonnel = 132;
            const productiveWeeksPerYear = 48;
            let xrcPrice = 1;
            let calcValuesRunning = false;

            const merchantChart = createChart('merchantChart', 'Total Merchants');
            const consumerChart = createChart('consumerChart', 'Total Consumers');
            const demandChart = createChart('demandChart', 'Merchant Demand for XRC​');
            const burnChart = createChart('burnChart', 'Cumulative Burn');

            jQuery('.raise-slider').jRange({
                from: 10,
                to: 50,
                step: 5,
                scale: ["10M", "20M", "30M", "40M", "50M"],
                format: '%s',
                width: 290,
                snap:true,
                showLabels: false,
                onstatechange: function (val) {
                    jQuery('#raise-value').html('$' + val + 'M');

                    let countries = 'South Africa<br />Netherlands';
                    let countryCount = 2;

                    if (val > 15) {
                        countries += '<br />Belgium';
                        countryCount++;
                    }
                    if (val > 25) {
                        countries += '<br />Germany';
                        countryCount++
                    }
                    if (val > 40) {
                        countries += '<br />Targeted Expansion';
                        countryCount++
                    }

                    jQuery('#raise-countries').html(countries);
                    salesPersonnel = val * Math.pow(10, 6) * 0.132/48500;
                    jQuery('#raise-sales-personnel').html(Math.floor(salesPersonnel));
                    jQuery('#raise-country-count').html(countryCount === 5 ? '5+' : countryCount);
                    calculateValues('.raise-slider');
                }

            }).jRange('setValue', '50');

            jQuery('.businessweek-slider').jRange({
                from: 1,
                to: 3,
                step: 0.25,
                scale: [1, 2, 3],
                format: '%s',
                snap:true,
                width: 290,
                showLabels: false,
                onstatechange: function (val) {
                    jQuery('#businessweek-value').html(val);
                    numberOfMerchants = [];
                    for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                        numberOfMerchants.push(
                            salesPersonnel * val *
                                (productiveWeeksPerYear * (i + 1)) * (1 + (i / 10)));
                    } // Chart Data...
                    calculateValues('.businessweek-slider');
                }

            }).jRange('setValue', "1.75");

            jQuery('.consumersperweek-slider').jRange({
                from: 1,
                to: 5,
                step: 1,
                scale: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
                format: '%s',
                width: 290,
                snap:true,
                showLabels: false,
                onstatechange: function (val) {
                    jQuery('#consumersperweek-value').html(val);
                    numberOfConsumers = [];
                    let consumerAdd = 0;
                    let annualAdd = 0
                    for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                        const weeklyAdd = (i === 0 ? numberOfMerchants[i] : numberOfMerchants[i] - numberOfMerchants[i - 1]) / 52;
                        for (let k = 1; k <= 52; k++) {
                            consumerAdd = k * val * weeklyAdd + annualAdd + consumerAdd
                        }
                        annualAdd = numberOfMerchants[i] * val;
                        numberOfConsumers.push(consumerAdd);
                    } // Chart Data
                    calculateValues('.consumersperweek-slider');
                }

            }).jRange('setValue', "2");

            jQuery('.consumer-redemptions-slider').jRange({
                from: 1,
                to: 36,
                step: 1,
                scale: [1, 8, 15, 22, 29, 36],
                format: '%s',
                width: 290,
                snap:true,
                showLabels: false,
                onstatechange: function (val) {
                    jQuery('#consumer-redemptions-value').html(val);
                    xrcDemand = [];
                    xrcBurn = [];

                    for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                        xrcDemand.push(numberOfConsumers[i] * 2.25 * val / xrcPrice);

                        xrcBurn.push((xrcDemand[i] * 0.05) + (i === 0 ? 0 : xrcBurn[i - 1]));
                    } // Chart Data
                    console.log(xrcBurn);
                    calculateValues('.consumer-redemptions-slider');
                }

            }).jRange('setValue', "9");

            jQuery('.xrcprice-slider').jRange({
                from: 0.5,
                to: 10,
                step: 0.5,
                scale: ["$0.50", "$5", "$10"],
                format: '$%s',
                width: 290,
                snap:true,
                showLabels: false,
                onstatechange: function (val) {
                    jQuery('#xrcprice-value').html('$' + val);
                    xrcPrice = val;
                    calculateValues('.xrcprice-slider');
                }

            }).jRange('setValue', "1");

            function calculateValues(sliderClass) {
                if (calcValuesRunning) {
                    return;
                }
                calcValuesRunning = true;
                setTimeout(function() {
                    const sliders = (sliderClass === 'xrcprice-slider' ? [
                        '.consumersperweek-slider',
                        '.consumer-redemptions-slide    r',] : [
                        '.raise-slider',
                        '.businessweek-slider',
                        '.consumersperweek-slider',
                        '.consumer-redemptions-slider',
                        '.xrcprice-slider']);

                    sliders.forEach(function(slider) {
                        if (sliderClass === slider) {
                            return;
                        }
                        slider = jQuery(slider);
                        const val = slider.val();
                        slider.jRange('setValue', "0");
                        slider.jRange('setValue', val);
                    });
                    
                    merchantChart.data.datasets[0].data = numberOfMerchants.map(function(num) {return Math.round(num);});
                    merchantChart.update();
                    consumerChart.data.datasets[0].data = numberOfConsumers.map(function(num) {return Math.round(num);});
                    consumerChart.update();
                    demandChart.data.datasets[0].data = xrcDemand.map(function(num) {return Math.round(num);});
                    demandChart.update();
                    burnChart.data.datasets[0].data = xrcBurn.map(function(num) {return Math.round(num);});
                    burnChart.update();
                    setTimeout(function() {
                        calcValuesRunning = false;
                    }, 1000);
                }, 200);
            }
        });
    </script> 		</div>
				</div>
						</div>
			</div>
		</div>

				<div data-id="ad12414" class="elementor-element elementor-element-ad12414 elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-inner-column" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
					<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
				<div data-id="444f45a" class="elementor-element elementor-element-444f45a elementor-widget elementor-widget-global elementor-global-408 elementor-widget-accordion" data-element_type="accordion.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-accordion" role="tablist">
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<h3 id="elementor-tab-title-7161" class="elementor-tab-title" tabindex="7161" data-tab="1" role="tab" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-7161">
												<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed fa fa-plus"></i>
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened fa fa-minus"></i>
						</span>
												<a href="">WHY USE BLOCKCHAIN & CRYPTOCURRENCY? </a>
					</h3>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-7161" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="1" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-7161"><p>AMARK adopted blockchain and cryptocurrency as tools to eliminate ANY need for the collection of personally identifiable information. AMARK uses public blockchain data, overlaid with merchant data, to identify consumer preferences, understand local trends and set a value for consumer attention.</p>
<p>Cryptocurrency is also the ONLY viable way to privately compensate a consumer for their attention as other digital payment methods expose the identity of the payee. If an individual consumer receiving an attention payment was identifiable via the payment method, then all response and preference data could be easily tied back to that individual, thereby compromising the individual’s data privacy.</p></div>
				</div>
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<h3 id="elementor-tab-title-7162" class="elementor-tab-title" tabindex="7162" data-tab="2" role="tab" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-7162">
												<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed fa fa-plus"></i>
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened fa fa-minus"></i>
						</span>
												<a href="">WHY NOT USE BITCOIN?</a>
					</h3>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-7162" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="2" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-7162"><p>Demand for BTC is largely speculative resulting in significant price swings which would negatively impact the AMARK ecosystem. In addition, there is a high concentration of bitcoin ownership which is a further risk to its value and therefore a risk to AMARK.</p><p>AMARK expects to quickly build fundamental demand for XRC through regional ecosystems resulting in wide distribution of the XRC currency. If XRC appreciates in value over time, marketing through AMARK will become more effective for businesses from an increased consumer demand for XRC. Greater consumer participation will result in greater ROI for businesses. The efficiency increase will lead to more businesses marketing through AMARK.</p></div>
				</div>
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<h3 id="elementor-tab-title-7163" class="elementor-tab-title" tabindex="7163" data-tab="3" role="tab" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-7163">
												<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed fa fa-plus"></i>
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened fa fa-minus"></i>
						</span>
												<a href="">WHO WILL USE XRC?</a>
					</h3>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-7163" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="3" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-7163"><p>The activation of AMARK allows merchants to purchase XRC through the attention marketing system and distribute it to consumers via targeted advertisements.</p><p>Consumers will join AMARK through local businesses to earn rewards in exchange for their attention and use XRC as a payment for goods and services across all AMARK businesses.</p></div>
				</div>
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<h3 id="elementor-tab-title-7164" class="elementor-tab-title" tabindex="7164" data-tab="4" role="tab" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-7164">
												<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed fa fa-plus"></i>
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened fa fa-minus"></i>
						</span>
												<a href="">Why will consumers join AMARK?</a>
					</h3>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-7164" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="4" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-7164"><p>Consumers will sign up to receive rewards from their favorite local businesses. In-Store discounts, XRC redemption and attention rewards combine to offer consumers significant value. The first-time customer onboard is a simple process. The entire process can be completed within 60 seconds.</p></div>
				</div>
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<h3 id="elementor-tab-title-7165" class="elementor-tab-title" tabindex="7165" data-tab="5" role="tab" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-7165">
												<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed fa fa-plus"></i>
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened fa fa-minus"></i>
						</span>
												<a href="">Why will merchants join AMARK?</a>
					</h3>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-7165" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="5" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-7165"><p>The efficiency of the AMARK system allows the fees charged to merchants to be far lower than current solutions. Current solutions are 3 to 7 times more expensive than AMARK. In addition, there are no subscription fees and no cost to the merchant until AMARK delivers a completed sale.</p><p>Payment terminals are provided by AMARK at no cost and there is a simple learning curve with virtually no merchant training necessary.</p></div>
				</div>
							<div class="elementor-accordion-item">
					<h3 id="elementor-tab-title-7166" class="elementor-tab-title" tabindex="7166" data-tab="6" role="tab" aria-controls="elementor-tab-content-7166">
												<span class="elementor-accordion-icon elementor-accordion-icon-right" aria-hidden="true">
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-closed fa fa-plus"></i>
							<i class="elementor-accordion-icon-opened fa fa-minus"></i>
						</span>
												<a href="">Why will merchants invite their customers to join?</a>
					</h3>
					<div id="elementor-tab-content-7166" class="elementor-tab-content elementor-clearfix" data-tab="6" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="elementor-tab-title-7166"><p>AMARK provides an AI based remarketing tool that allows a merchant to efficiently increase the frequency of their customer visits. Frequency improvements from a current customer base can have significant effects on margin for a merchant.</p><p>The remarketing tool is also free to merchants and offers customers a significant amount of value in exchange for their attention. In addition, a merchant adding customers to AMARK blocks competing businesses from reaching their customers.</p></div>
				</div>
